app_idea: A chat-gpt app for mobile users

competitors.name: ChatGPT
competitors.description:
Introducing ChatGPT for Android: OpenAI’s latest advancements at your fingertips.

This official app is free, syncs your history across devices, and brings you the latest from OpenAI, including the new image generator.

With ChatGPT in your pocket, you’ll find:

· Image generation–Generate original images from a description, or transform existing ones with a few simple words. 
· Advanced Voice Mode–Tap the soundwave icon to have a real-time convo on the go. Settle a dinner table debate, or practice a new language. 
· Photo upload—Snap or upload a picture to transcribe a handwritten recipe or get info about a landmark. 
· Creative inspiration—Find custom birthday gift ideas or create a personalized greeting card.
· Tailored advice—Talk through a tough situation, ask for a detailed travel itinerary, or get help crafting the perfect response. 
· Personalized learning—Explain electricity to a dinosaur-loving kid or easily brush up yourself on a historic event.
· Professional input—Brainstorm marketing copy or map out a business plan.
· Instant answers—Get recipe suggestions when you only have a few ingredients.

Join hundreds of millions of users and try the app captivating the world. Download ChatGPT today.

Terms of service & privacy policy:
https://openai.com/policies/terms-of-use
https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy

competitors.name: GPT Chatbot AI - Genie
competitors.description:
Genie is a revolutionary AI chatbot assistant built on GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen for you to access all the assistance you need from a single app.

Genie AI is not just any chatbot app; it's a super helpful tool, crafted with advanced AI technology built on GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen. Imagine having a clever friend right in your phone, always ready to chat, assist, and simplify your daily routine. This chatbot is exceptional because it's built on intelligence of AI models such as GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen. Ensuring a deeper understanding of your needs and queries.

Interacting with Genie, an AI chatbot, is both enjoyable and practical. You can throw any question at it, seek advice, organize your schedule, or indulge in a casual conversation. What makes it stand out is the multiple AI models' (built on GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen) advanced AI capabilities, making it not just smart, but incredibly intuitive. Whether you're tech-savvy or just a regular smartphone user, you'll find Genie's interface user-friendly and easy to navigate.

This AI chatbot, built on GPT-4o technology, is like a personal assistant that's available round the clock. You can rely on Genie for quick answers, helpful suggestions, or even as a learning companion. The integration of GPT-4o's AI technology means that Genie is constantly learning and evolving, making each chat experience better than the last.

Genie understands context and nuance better than most chatbots. Whether you're planning a trip, needing recipe ideas, or just feeling chatty, Genie is equipped to handle a wide range of topics with ease. It's not just a chatbot; it's a smart AI companion designed to enhance your daily life, making every interaction with your smartphone more meaningful and productive.

Do not enter personal information. May generate offensive or dangerous content. Genie is not liable for content generated.

Privacy: https://appnation.co/privacy
Terms: https://appnation.co/terms

competitors.name: AI Chatbot - Nova
competitors.description:
Nova is a revolutionary AI chatbot and personal assistant, built on the latest GPT-4, Google Gemini, Claude, and DeepSeek technologies.

Nova Chatbot uses advanced AI developed on the technology such as GPT-4o that understands your questions and generates human-like responses, making you feel like you are 
chatting with a knowledgeable friend. Nova Chatbot & AI Assistant can even recommend a book to read or a movie to watch!

Nova AI Chatbot is the #1 cross-compatible chatbot, developed using multiple AI models to make the latest AI chat technologies accessible in the most user-friendly way. It is the only cross-platform chatbot app built on GPT-4, Google Gemini, and Claude, offering industry-first features.

Key Features:
- Latest AI technology developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o
- Built on GPT-4 to get answers from the Internet
- AI Assistant to serve your needs
- Unlimited questions and answers
- Multi-language support (140+ languages)
- Cross-compatible device support (iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and web)
- Nova Chatbot has the ability to have dialogs with the AI chatbot (AI remembers full chat history)
- Built on DeepSeek for enhanced, real-time information retrieval and smarter, context-aware responses.

【 YOUR AI WRITING ASSISTANT 】
With Nova AI Chatbot, you have access to a personal AI assistant for all types of writing projects, whether it is social media posts, essays, or poems. Basically, AI Assistant that built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o & Gemini, can assist with any task, such as crafting a unique and unforgettable pickup line or even creating an original song. That's right! This AI Chatbot helper app which is develoed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o is not only smart but also creative. Let your AI Assistant do the things you imagine!

AI copywriter: Nova Chatbot has an AI writer and text generator feature developed on GPT-4o which is useful for writing anything from ads and descriptions to sales pitches and video scripts. AI content writer: Use the Nova chatbot tool built on GPT-4 for your content marketing (blog posts, articles, social media posts).

【 A METICULOUS PROOFREADER 】
Developed on GPT-4 and GPT-4o, Nova Chatbot's AI built on proofreader is top-of-the-line. 
Your AI Assistant can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you create professional-grade documents. With the AI Chatbot which is developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o, you can ensure that your texts are polished and mistake-free.

AI proofreading: The Nova AI Chatbot built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o API makes it easy to express yourself in any style and tone while making sure your grammar, punctuation, and spelling are correct.

【 A RELIABLE CHAT PARTNER 】
Whether you're seeking some amusement, advice, or simply in need of someone to talk to, Nova AI is always available for you. This AI companion app, built on GPT-4, is capable of producing human-like responses, making you feel as though you're conversing with a close friend. It can even recommend a book to read or a movie to watch!

Download the AI app now and have your virtual assistant, built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o & Gemini & Claude, always at hand.

AI uses OpenAI’s GPT-4 API, but we are not associated with OpenAI. We only use their official GPT-4 API for our app. 
Nova AI is not affiliated with any government or political entity. The information provided in AI is for informational purposes only and should not be considered official or authoritative.

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES
You can subscribe for unlimited access to Advanced AI features developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o.
Subscriptions are billed automatically at the rate depending on the selected subscription plan.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

Privacy Policy: https://novaapp.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://novaapp.ai/terms
Do you have a question for us?
support@novaapp.ai

competitors.name: AI Chat・Ask Chatbot Assistant
competitors.description:
AI Chat app is built on the latest Top AI Models, including GPT-4o & GPT-4o mini, Grok 3, DeepSeek-V3 & R1, Gemini 2.0, Claude 3.7, LLaMA 3.3 — and we’re continuously expanding and upgrading to bring you the best AI experience.

You can ask AI Chat anything! Not only can you chat with our AI, but you can also use our AI Photo Generator to unleash your creativity and create unique amazing AI-generated images in various styles such as Anime, Cyberpunk, logo... and many more!

That's not all—we also offer AI Keyboard, AI characters and assistants, real-time data access, custom prompts, file uploads, web browsing, data analysis, and so much more. Dive in and discover all the features waiting for you!

【Key Features】
- AI Chat: Human-like Responses
Whether you're looking to explore new ideas, searching for information, seeking daily work help, writing posts on social media like RedNote, or just want to talk with someone, you can chat with our AI chatbot. Built on GPT-4o, AI Chat brings you fantasy experience and Human-like responses!

- AI Photo & Image Generator & AI Art & Logo maker
Harness the power of AI Chat to create stunning AI-Generated Images, unleashing your creativity! You can also try AI avatar, headshot, and AI logo maker. Lots of styles to choose from: Anime, Photography, Sketch, Cyberpunk, Tattoo, Cartoon 2D & 3D... and many more!

- Smart AI Character & AI Friend & AI Assistant 
We have many customized prompts and AI Characters ready to help you with your daily tasks. These include language teacher, essay writer, math tutor, email writer, social media copywriter, songwriter, and many more. Built on GPT-4o, they can greatly improve your efficiency! Also you can create your persona Character AI companion!

- AI Keyboard works in any app
AI Keyboard is also built on GPT-4o. It features Grammar Check, Tone Changer, Ask AI, Paraphrase, Versify and many more. Elevate your words with AI at your fingertips.

- Real-Time Web Search - Stay Current, Stay Informed!
Say goodbye to data limitations! Now you can access to the real-time data by web search!

- AI-Enhanced YouTube:
Harness the power of AI Chat to get insightful summaries of your favorite YouTube videos.

- AI-Powered PDF Analysis: 
Transform lengthy PDFs into concise, actionable insights. Join the AI revolution and streamline your content consumption today!

- AI Web Parsing 
AI Chat now intelligently distills web content, making complex information accessible at a glance.

【Wide Range of Uses】
- Essay Writer
AI Chat uses natural language processing to help you write the perfect essay, so you can impress your professors and get better grades.

- Language Learning
Built on GPT-4o, AI Chat can help you practice your grammar, vocabulary, and speaking skills.

- Do Math, Photomath
With AI character built on GPT-4o, you can solve math problem and do photomath better, from basic arithmetic to advanced calculus. 

- Write Code
AI chatbot help you write, check and optimize code. Also it can explain the function of code for you.

- Business Conversations
AI Chat can be a valuable tool for businesses to engage in intelligent conversations with customers and clients

- Social Media Manager
AI Chat can help you schedule posts, track engagement and analyze your social media metrics.

- Health and Fitness Coach
AI Chat can help you track your meals, create personalized workout plans, and give you tips on how to stay healthy and fit.

- Entertainment Guru
AI Chat can give recommendations on movies, TV shows, and music based on your preferences. 

- Daily Chit-Chat: 
Have fun and engaging conversations with our intelligent AI chatbot.

With AI Chat, built on GPT-4o, you get a versatile personal assistant capable of answering any question, generating stunning AI art, and providing extensive support across various domains. Experience the future with AI Chat – your ultimate AI-powered companion!

competitors.name: ChatOn - AI Chat Bot Assistant
competitors.description:
Welcome to the world of AI-powered assistance! Meet ChatOn, your chat AI and virtual assistant designed to streamline your daily tasks. Built on the latest GPT-4o, o4-mini, Sonar, Claude 3.7, and DeepSeek-R1 technologies, ChatOn offers a responsive AI experience that’s highly effective. Whether you need help drafting emails, creating visuals, or generating ideas, turn to this chatbot for help.

PIC TRANSFORMER:
Give your photos a trendy makeover with Pic Transformer! Upload your picture, pick a style—Japanese Cartoon, Plushy, Cyberpunk, or Action Figure with the app's AI Action Figure Maker—and let your pocket chatbot do the rest! In the latest pic transformer feature, you can meet your toy-sized self with an AI action figure generator, become a cute plushie, step into the cyber-future, and so much more.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR:
Create visuals that match your style with our AI picture generator. Just tweak the image generator chat settings and turn your ideas into pics of any size and style.

IMAGE-TO-TEXT CONVERTER:
Our chatbot can assist in extracting text from pics, letting you insert it into the chat AI instantly.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT:
ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, offers a versatile AI writing assistant that helps with any writing project, from emails and speeches to social posts and poems. You can pick the length and tone of the chatbot’s answers and get ideas for follow-up questions to keep your chat going.

WEB ANALYZER:
The chatbot AI, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, is ideal for finding online answers to questions. From getting to know the weather to discovering the latest fashion trends, our chatbot is here for you.

DOC MASTER:
ChatOn can summarize, rewrite, and translate any doc. And if you have questions about the file’s content, the chatbot AI will answer them all.

YOUTUBE PRO:
Share any YouTube link with the chatbot, and it will summarize, translate, or answer questions about the video content.

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER:
Get ready to boost your skills in AI writing with ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, as it can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you improve it.

AI REWRITER:
The chatbot AI can rewrite your text, making it more engaging and professional right in the chat.

SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS CREATOR:
Crafting social media posts becomes easy with ChatOn. Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this AI writing assistant helps you create content for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, or X profiles. And if you want an eye-catching image to go with it, our AI image generator can create one in seconds.

TEXT SUMMARIZER:
ChatOn’s summarization features, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, identify key information and present it in a concise way.

MATH GURU:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this chat AI helps you grasp the subject matter rather than simply get immediate solutions. You can even visualize math problems with our AI picture generator to make understanding easier.

EXPERT CODER:
ChatOn can write and check any programming code, preventing potential bugs.

CV AND COVER LETTER BUILDER:
Create a pro resume and cover letter that will show your talents and experience in the best light possible. For a visual touch, use our AI image generator to create graphics that make your CV stand out.

EMAIL GENERATOR:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, ChatOn crafts well-structured, compelling emails suited to your needs. You can enhance these emails with unique visuals created with our AI picture generator.

Whether you’re chatting, creating content, or generating images, ChatOn offers an all-in-one chatbot AI solution for your daily productivity. Just type your request or pick from the app’s 100+ ready-made prompts, and the bot will assist you.

Explore the potential of GPT-4o, GPT-4, and Claude in ChatOn and discover how this intelligent assistant can help you.

Download ChatOn, start chatting in the AI chat or creating images in the AI picture generator, and boost your productivity here and now!

competitors.name: Ask AI - Chat with AI Chatbot
AI Chat App - AI Chat bot

feedback.text: Dictation change sucks I can't review my dictations anymore before it sends. it doesn't get everything right, some words are totally wrong, and then the response is based on the incorrect dictation. BIG waste of my time. I've sent feedback several times, but nothing has been done. As much as I love the app, I had to delete my 5 star review from last year and post this one instead. Please revert the tool so we can stop the recording and check that it's correct before sending! CGPT+ MEMBER

So long as you don't use GPT-4o it's gotten better. 4.1 is still kind of a brown nose. It's that up vote system. the easiest way for your AI to win it us just to agree all the time based on the parameters you set. I remember when 4.5 first came out, I was blown away by some of the writing and accuracy and its ability to see context. but then within gosh, like a month it just collapsed. I don't like your system. but at least the reasoning models are... usable. also long convos crash sometimes.

Issue solved...? Great app! I use it almost every day, I love doing roleplays with my stories I'm writing and it gives me some lines that I find awesome and I want to add to my books. i also liked how it was able to give me resources for a couple things I was wanting to look up. One struggle: Math equation creations. It's GREAT at solving math, giving you a step-by-step guide so you know how to do it yourself. But when you ask it to create a math equation with a SPECIFIC style, it struggles.

Read reviews. Inaccurate Info and frustratingly repetitive. Even when you learn how to better communicate with it for desired purposes. Subscription lets you pay to test and "teach" their app. It's not AI at all. It's not well informed. It's not particularly Intelligent. When you cancel Your subscription you don't even get the full month of upgraded experience. Terrible app. Poorly Designed. This is definitely not the future, lol. Don't waste your $ on this. I want a Refund!

voice functionality is trash on the app. it used to work great until a couple of updates back. now I get a generic error message and lose the ability to send any sort of reply after a failed attempt to use the speech-to-text function until I fully close and restart the app. meanwhile, actual voice chat just sits there listening infinitely without responding at all. also, bring back Monday.

Great for some quick research, story writing help, and much more. There has been an noticeable improvement on reliability, another issue that has come up now is that the AI only saves the initial prompt I have used and won't save the while conversation, it makes me have to restart a conversation over and over after I leave the app. I did not use the setting for temporary conversation, it should be saving like it has in past updates.

Used to be so good. Now, there is "high traffic" constantly. Your subscriptions mean nothing as you are limited to 10 prompts a day as opposed to previously unlimited. What am I paying for? The convenience that the AI models are grouped and can't even get work done because of the limits? You can just download the models they have on their app individually and use them for free. They took something great and ruined it.

I enjoyed using this app so much that I purchased a year's membership. Unfortunately, the moment I made this purchase, I had nothing but trouble, like being double charged for a yearly and a weekly subscription and, most notably, no longer having access to the "pro gpt-4" model instead of the standard 3.5 model. I hope this is a glitch and not a scam, but just in case, buyer beware!

It didn't provide the 3 day trial and charged me for a week. I was going to see if I should pay a yearly one but now I don't even want to because it could've gone towards the year subscription. Update: That said, full version isn't that different from a free version on other chat GPT platforms. It can't remember anything and can't be customized and stay that way. It starts over every time. There is nothing special to pay for. Waste of money

I've experimented with chat GPT in my browser before and it's pretty astonishing. To give an idea of what it can do, this AI can actually write knitting patterns. The more complex ones can have some minor errors (such as yarn yardage) but pointing out its mistakes seems to fairly reliably yield the correct results. As for this app, I like it a lot so far. If I come to find that I have a real need for it on a regular basis, I'd say it might be worth it to pay for the full version.

trying to link accounts across different platforms is nearly impossible. I paid for a year on the app and when I tried to sign in on my computer I needed to pay again. Just canceled my subscription through the app as it was more expensive then the web. Now trying to figure out how to get a refund. Will update rating if im able to figure out the refund as it's a good app. Just seems to be a money guzzler.

Most of the features are good, but the Deepseek feature is utterly useless and trash. they won't answer your question no matter what. This part of the features claims to have a mental health support companion but it's a total lie. that simply won't answer you. Every other feature is pretty cool so far other than that one.

unfortunately I hit the 1 year subscription button instead of the 3 day trial. I put my credit information to pay the 1.00 and thought I hit that one . I paid $59.99 by accident and tried to cancel it but to late. They are now not letting me use it cause I removed my card info. I already paid for a year I didn't want and now I can't use it til I give them my card info ! that is theft. They need to return my $59.99 minus the $1.00 my advice don't even bother with 3 days it has bugs !

Always evolving! Been using the app for just over a year. Works well overall. Occasionally, something changes, which can be frustrating and confusing, but once things get smoothed out, it's back quickly with improvements. My only complaint is that the image generator used to create wonderful images, but now it fails to interpret my prompts accurately. There's a limit on tries, so I often can't get the image I desire before reaching the limit. Otherwise, great product!

It started off great. I used it a handful of times and was very pleased. Even gave me a great recommendation for a new lap top. it's been stuck on a creating your experience page for over a month now. I put in 3 tickets, only 2 took and I never got a reply. I requested a refund on my last ticket but haven't heard anything back. Do not recommend until the bugs are worked out. If they fix it so I can actually use it, I will keep it.

Don't go with the subscription!!! Yesterday, I purchased your lifetime subscription. I am not happy with your service. It feels like a scam. Your tools are not capable of performing as expected, The free version of ChatGPT offers better speed and features compared to your premium apps. Now facing another issue, after the paid version is still asking to upgrade to premium. I hope the developer team is looking.

Tried using this chatbot for help and simple tasks, but it constantly misunderstands or gives vague, irrelevant answers. It acts like it knows everything but dodges direct questions or adds fluff nobody asked for. Half the time it breaks or ignores instructions. You spend more time correcting it than actually getting help. Save yourself the headache.

Not Useful at all . Free Chat GPT is better than this app. You cannot attach PDFs . You cannot attach one more than one Image . You cannot generate images with accurate English and as per your command. It doesn't create any PPT , DOC or Word . It cannot even produce accurate results. waste of money. I want my money back actually. don't pay even 100rs for this thing .

I am writing to express my disappointment with the current level of access provided by your chatbot AI service. Despite being a paid subscriber, I am experiencing significant limitations that do not align with the expectations set during the subscription process. As a subscriber, I anticipated premium features, broader capabilities, and priority support. However, in practice, the AI seems to have restricted access to important tools, real-time data, or advanced functionality

I didn't make a purchase myself of this app. One day when I was very busy at work, I realized there is a message about a payment made with my card for this app but it was not me. I suspect of 2 things: Either the phone touched a wrong place in my pocket or it was a scam. I contacted Google and was waiting for an answer. They suggested me to contact with you. You can easily see that I have never used this app and I never will. I don't need it. I request a full refund.
